Class Projectile

java.lang.Object
com.shiroyama.chess2.arena.Projectile
public class Projectile extends Object
Represents a projectile in the arena. Projectiles are fired by chess pieces and move across the arena.

  • Constructor Details

    • Projectile

      public Projectile(Team shooterTeam, TargetPoint startPosition, TargetPoint targetPosition)
      Constructor for the Projectile class. Creates a new projectile.
      Parameters:
      shooterTeam - the team of the piece that fired the projectile
      startPosition - the initial position of the projectile
      targetPosition - the position toward which the projectile will move

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(float deltaTime)
      Updated the projectile's position based on its velocity.
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time elapsed since the last update

    • isOutOfBounds

      public boolean isOutOfBounds(TargetPoint arenaBounds)
      Check if the projectile is out of the arena boundaries.
      Parameters:
      arenaBounds - the boundaries of the arena
      Returns:
      true if the projectile is out of bounds, false otherwise

    • hit

      public boolean hit(PieceInfo piece)
      Check if the projectile hit the other piece.
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece to check for collision
      Returns:
      true if the projectile hit the piece, false otherwise

    • getShooterTeam

      public Team getShooterTeam()
      Gets the team of the shooter.
      Returns:
      the team which fired the projectile

    • setShooterTeam

      public void setShooterTeam(Team shooterTeam)
      Sets the team of the shooter.
      Parameters:
      shooterTeam - the team to set

    • getPosition

      public TargetPoint getPosition()
      Gets the position of the projectile.
      Returns:
      the current position of the projectile

    • setPosition

      public void setPosition(TargetPoint position)
      Sets the position of the projectile
      Parameters:
      position - the new position

    • getVelicoty

      public TargetPoint getVelicoty()
      Gets the velocity of the projectile.
      Returns:
      the velocity vector

    • setVelicoty

      public void setVelicoty(TargetPoint velocity)
      Sets the velocity of the projectile.
      Parameters:
      velocity - the new velocity
